summary: Daily Login Streak feature fully tested. All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly. Backend: Login returns streak data, /api/user/streak returns detailed streak info, /api/user/streak/leaderboard returns rankings. Frontend: Profile page shows Streak tab with hero card, stats grid, milestones, leaderboard, and how-it-works section.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint returns healthy status
Backend: Login endpoint returns streak fields (login_streak, best_login_streak, total_login_days, streak_points, last_login_date)
Backend: /api/user/streak requires authentication (returns 401/403 without token)

Backend: /api/user/streak returns all expected fields (current_streak, best_streak, total_login_days, streak_points, last_login_date, streak_active, next_milestone, days_to_milestone, current_multiplier)
Backend: /api/user/streak/leaderboard is publicly accessible
Backend: Leaderboard returns correct structure with rank, username, login_streak, best_streak, streak_points
Backend: Leaderboard respects limit parameter
Backend: New user registration triggers streak initialization
Backend: /api/auth/me returns streak fields
Frontend: Profile page loads correctly
Frontend: Login form works with admin credentials
Frontend: Streak tab is visible and clickable
Frontend: Streak hero card displays current streak value (1)
Frontend: Streak status badge shows 'Active' when logged in today
Frontend: Progress bar shows 'Progress to 7 days' with '6 days to go'
Frontend: Best Streak stat card displays correctly (1)
Frontend: Streak Points stat card displays correctly (10)
Frontend: Total Days stat card displays correctly (1)
Frontend: Multiplier stat card displays correctly (1x)
Frontend: Milestones section shows all 7 milestone badges (7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 180, 365 days)
Frontend: Top Streakers leaderboard displays with rankings
Frontend: Current user highlighted in leaderboard with '(You)' label
Frontend: How Streaks Work section displays all 4 rules
seed_data_creation: Created test user TEST_streak_* for new user streak testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Daily Login Streak feature is fully implemented and working. Backend streak logic calculates consecutive logins correctly. Frontend Profile page has 4-tab layout with Streak as first tab. All streak components (hero card, stats grid, milestones, leaderboard, how-it-works) are rendering correctly. Admin user has 1 day streak with 10 points after testing. Test user TEST_streak_* was created during testing.
